column37: Our Full-Time MBA Program at the University of Toronto, Rotman School of Management is best defined as a transformational experience. We believe that your journey begins with 'why'. Please describe why you are pursuing an MBA? Why Rotman? Why now? (500 words)
column38: Reflection Question: List 3-5 attributes or characteristics that best describe you.

column36: What are your motivations to pursue an MBA? (200 Words)
column37: What excites you about the UBC MBA Program? How do you plan to get the most out of this journey? (200 Words)
column38: The UBC MBA program prepares leaders who seek to create value for the world. Please describe a situation in which you created value for an organization or group. What was the outcome? We encourage you to consider your contributions in both professional and community settings.( 500 word limit.)
column42: Yes, Please respond to the following question, in video format (60-90 seconds) and upload it to either YouTube or Vimeo and provide the video's URL in the space provided. Q)  Our students and alumni often describe their MBA experience as a transformational discovery of themselves. How do you see yourself being transformed by the UBC MBA program?

column36: Cover Letter: A cover letter outlining current responsibilities and assignments, career accomplishments, reasons for applying to the Queen’s MBA and your professional and personal goals.

column36: Statement of Interest: Approximately 500 words outlining your reasons for graduate study, your career objectives, the research interest(s) you may wish to pursue in the MBA Global/MBA Technology & Innovation, how your previous studies and experience have prepared you for the program.

The HEC Montréal MBA program is based on shared experiences and emphasizes collaborative learning. In view of this approach, tell us what you hope to learn from your MBA colleagues to help you achieve your personal and professional goals (500 words maximum).
column40: FOR REAPPLICANT: If you have previously applied for admission, you must also answer the following question:How has your situation changed since you applied last time? Make sure you explain any change in your work experience, studies and volunteering (250 words maximum).

column15: The MBA consists of 20 half courses and tuition per half-course starting September 2018 will be  $2,880.78 CAD per half course.
column36: Answer the following two questions as clearly and concisely as possible – only the first 250 words in each answer will be read. (1) How, considering your career progress to date does an MBA fit in with your future career goals? Please describe..(2) When thinking of your own personal successes – were they as a result of your own personal skills or your ability to work with others? Please describe
